titles.title: A resolution commending the New Orleans Saints of the National Football League for winning their Monday Night Football game on Monday, September 25, 2006 by a score of 23 to 3.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 9/26/2006--Introduced. Commends the New Orleans Saints of the National Football League for winning their Monday, September 25, 2006, game with the Atlanta Falcons (their first game in the Louisiana Superdome since Hurricanes Katrina and Rita).
